description: Italy and Spain accuse northern European countries of not doing enough to help in economic crisis.
title: Coronavirus: North-South divide clouds key EU meeting
title_page: Coronavirus: North-South divide clouds key EU meeting - BBC News
maintext: For years some economists have urged the eurozone to issue common bonds, to address the structural fragility that the euro crisis exposed. But others, mainly in northern Europe, argue that taxpayers in wealthier countries should not have to bail out countries whose politicians were fiscally irresponsible.
